2 Install Windows(from Manim Cast #1) Relevant links and commands sorted like in the video (Windows): 2.1 Python: https://www.python.org/downloads/ Command for CMD to test Python: python3 Add to Path: C:\Users\YOUR_USERNAME\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python37\Scripts\ C:\Users\YOUR_USERNAME\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python37\ 2.2 Miktex: https://miktex.org/ 2.3 FFmpeg: https://www.gyan.dev/ffmpeg/builds/ https://ffmpeg.zeranoe.com/builds/ <- not working FFmpeg Path: C:\FFmpeg\bin window build version https://www.gyan.dev/ffmpeg/builds/ install Tutorial: https://www.wikihow.com/Install-FFmpe‚Ä¶ 2.4 Sox: https://sourceforge.net/projects/sox/ 2.5 Pycairo: Pycairo Command for CMD to install pycairo: - Pycairo: a set of bindings for the cairo graphics library. These builds are not compatible with PyGTK and wxPython. cp38„ÅØpython 3.8 ver„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜÊÑèÂë≥ cp37„ÅØpython 3.7 ver„Å®„ÅÑ„ÅÜÊÑèÂë≥ python -m pip install pycairo-YOUR_VERSION python -m pip install pycairo‚Äë1.20.0‚Äëcp38‚Äëcp38‚Äëwin_amd64.whl python -m pip install pycairo‚Äë1.20.0‚Äëcp37‚Äëcp37m‚Äëwin32.whl 2.6 Requirements Requirements Command for CMD to install requirements: python -m pip install -r requirements.txt 2.7 Install Manim: python -m pip install manimlib 2.8 Test Python File: from manimlib.imports import * class TestScene(Scene): def construct(self): t = TextMobject("Hello manim!") t.scale(2) self.play(Write(t)) self.wait()

7 Set Up Êó•Êú¨Ë™û 7.1 use uplatex uplatex aa.tex 7.2 run dvisvgm command 7.3 dfkjdsljfj a sample Markdown Remember each Rmd file contains one and only one chapter, and a chapter is defined by the first-level heading #. To compile this example to PDF, you need XeLaTeX. You are recommended to install TinyTeX (which includes XeLaTeX): https://yihui.org/tinytex/.
